  2. Ai Website Builder With Custom Email
★ Custom Email Guide

AI Website Builder with Custom Email

Need a professional email with your AI-built site? Most builders integrate with Google Workspace. Here's how to get custom email on any AI website builder.

See Top AI Builders Updated: January 2025

Quick Answer: Use Google Workspace

All AI builders integrate with Google Workspace.

None of the AI website builders include custom email for free. But they all integrate with Google Workspace (formerly G Suite).

The setup: Purchase Google Workspace separately ($6-12/month), connect via DNS settings, and you@yourdomain.com works on Framer, Durable, 10Web, Squarespace—any of them.

How Custom Email Works with AI Builders

Option 1: Google Workspace (Recommended)

Works with: Framer, Durable, 10Web, Squarespace, Webflow, all AI builders
Cost: $6-12/month depending on plan
Setup: Purchase from Google, update DNS records, verify in builder
Pros: Professional Gmail, works everywhere, reliable
Cons: Extra cost, requires DNS setup

Option 2: Builder's Email Service

10Web: Includes Titan email or Google Workspace integration
Squarespace: Google Workspace integration
Others: Typically Google Workspace only

AI Builders with Email Integration

All AI Builders

Framer, Durable, 10Web, Squarespace—all integrate with Google Workspace (Gmail). You@yourdomain.com works on any of them.

Cost: $6-12/month for Google Workspace

Setup: Purchase from Google, connect via DNS settings

Framer AI

10Web AI

Via Google Workspace or Titan

10Web hosting includes email via Titan or Google Workspace integration. WordPress email plugins also available.

Cost:

Setup:

Durable AI

Via Google Workspace

Connect Google Workspace via DNS settings. Durable doesn't have native email—you'll use Google's service.

Cost:

Setup:

Step-by-Step: Connect Custom Email

Step 1: Purchase your domain

Buy yourdomain.com from the AI builder or a registrar (Namecheap, Google Domains).

Step 2: Purchase Google Workspace

Go to workspace.google.com, sign up, choose your domain (you@yourdomain.com).

Step 3: Update DNS records

Google will provide MX records. Add these to your domain's DNS settings (in the AI builder or registrar).

Step 4: Verify

Google will verify the domain. Once verified, email works. Test by sending an email to you@yourdomain.com.

Pricing Breakdown

Service Monthly Cost Annual Cost
Google Workspace Business $6/user/month $72/user/year
Google Workspace Business Plus $12/user/month $144/user/year
Framer AI $15-25/month $180-300/year
10Web AI $10-60/month $120-720/year

Bottom Line

Custom email works with all AI builders via Google Workspace. None include it for free, but integration is seamless. Budget $6-12/user/month for email on top of your AI builder subscription.

The Email Verdict

Use Google Workspace for professional email on any AI builder. It's the industry standard and works everywhere. The extra $6-12/month is worth it for credibility.
